nodes.text: Rendili Hyperworks was a Rendili-based company affiliated with the Rendili Vehicle Corporation and Rendili StarDrive.

During the Great Sith War, Rendili Hyperworks created the Praetorian-class frigate and the Hammerhead-class cruiser. Some time later, the company sold the blueprints of the Praetorian design to Corellian Engineering Corporation, who retooled the design into the Class VI bulk freighter.

The company also produced the Inexpugnable-class tactical command ship in cooperation with the Vanjervalis Systems conglomerate. This business venture went under the name the Rendili/Vanjervalis Drive Yards.
